name: Dissociation: Shadow of oneself
description:
You are the alter. You are the shadow of one man's mind.

The stronger he rejects you the stronger you become.

There is no relief, there is no defeat.

At the end, there is only death.

___
How does the game works?

Fight against your trueself.
Start with no damaging ability, but gradually become a better clone than the original one, copying his abilities.

Each skill is unlocked after a certain number of uses by your opponent.

Be patient, he will foolessly give you all the power you need.

___
Play with keyboard or controller.

KEYBOARD:
-WASD to move
-Spacebar, leftshift to dash
-Abilities with J,K,L. Or, if you prefer to use the mouse: leftclick, rightclick, third mouse button.

CONTROLLER:
-Left analog to move
-A or Right Bumper to dash
-Abilities with X,Y,B.
